content:
I think the latest nightly was built 3 days ago. I think we recently discussed moving the nightlies into their own repository, but unless I missed it, that hasn't happened yet. Is something going wrong with the nightlies? :smile: @Anton
Thanks :pray:
image.png
I dont anything is wrong. I think they get built/packaged manually rn, and I think @Anton had a few days leave.
Ah, interesting. I don't know why, I thought the nightlies would be an automated process :+1:
A new nightly will be produced in a few hours, it's not completely automated for security reasons. It can be automated securely but that setup takes some time.
